scripts.postinstall: npx syncpack fix-mismatches && npx syncpack set-semver-ranges
scripts.version:publish: npm run build:all && npx changeset publish
scripts.build:all: ng build ngx-tools && ng build ngx-material && ng build ngx-service-worker && ng build ngx-forms && ng build ngx-forms-inputs
scripts.link:ngx-tools: npm run build -w @consensus-labs/ngx-tools && cd dist/ngx-tools && yalc push
scripts.link:ngx-material: npm run build -w @consensus-labs/ngx-material && cd dist/ngx-material && yalc push
scripts.link:ngx-forms: npm run build -w @consensus-labs/ngx-forms && cd dist/ngx-forms && yalc push
scripts.link:ngx-forms-inputs: npm run build -w @consensus-labs/ngx-forms-inputs && cd dist/ngx-forms-inputs && yalc push
scripts.link:ngx-service-worker: npm run build -w @consensus-labs/ngx-service-worker && cd dist/ngx-service-worker && yalc push
